attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dissolve Parliament The  British  people  are  appalled  at the  shocking way  that   public  money has  been  misused  by  many  MP's - and  even  our own  Prime  Minister - who in the main, don't  seem   to  understand   what    they have  done  wrong.  We have  no   confidence  in  our  MP's   or  Government  as it  stands.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
